30
31#include <stdarg.h>
32
33#include <string.h>
34
35#include "gmp.h"
36#include "gmp-impl.h"
37
38
39int
40gmp_vsscanf (const char *s, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
41{
42#if SSCANF_WRITABLE_INPUT
43 /* We only actually need this if there's standard C types in fmt, and if
44 "s" is not already writable, but it's too much trouble to check that,
45 and in any case this writable sscanf input business is only for a few
46 old systems. */
47 size_t size;
48 char *alloc;
49 int ret;
50 size = strlen (s) + 1;
51 alloc = (char *) (*__gmp_allocate_func) (size);
52 memcpy (alloc, s, size);
53 s = alloc;
54 ret = __gmp_doscan (&__gmp_sscanf_funs, (void *) &s, fmt, ap);
55 (*__gmp_free_func) (alloc, size);
56 return ret;
57
58#else
59 return __gmp_doscan (&__gmp_sscanf_funs, (void *) &s, fmt, ap);
60#endif
61}
62
